I am a huge ed sheeran fan.
Poker is my favorite card game.

participant_2.background:
I am an introvert.
I live on a faraway island.
I write romance novels.
I have two cats.
I am a writer.

content.text: Hi there! My name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you, participant_2. What do you do for fun?
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a book, but I'm not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great resources out there to help you get started. You could check out some books on writing, or you could take a class.
I think I'll check out some books. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I'm learning jujitsu, and I'm a huge fan of Ed Sheeran. I also play poker and run to relieve stress.
That's cool! I've never tried jujitsu, but it sounds like a lot of fun. I love Ed Sheeran too! His music is so great. I'm not much of a poker player, but I do enjoy running.
It's definitely worth checking out! What kind of writing do you do?
I write romance novels, mostly historical romances. I love writing about love and adventure.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read a romance novel, but I'm sure I would enjoy them.
I hope you would! You should check out some of my books.
I will! I'm excited to read them.
Great! I hope you enjoy them.
